thread.title: Classic rock for Columbus Day weekend
thread.title_full: Classic rock for Columbus Day weekend

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Classic rock for Columbus Day weekend
text:
Classic rock for Columbus Day weekend Oct 02, 2015 Amber Jack 
Rockland — Maine classic rock band Amber Jack will perform Saturday, Oct. 10, 9 p.m. to closing at Trackside Station, 4 Union St. There is no cover charge for the 21-and-older show. 
Amber Jack specializes in music from the 1960s and ‘70s, but also ranges from the 1980s to the present. The band features, yes, Dean Martin on lead vocals and rhythm guitar, his brother Mike on lead guitar and Todd Staples on drums. They are based in Farmingdale. 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
